properties.name: options
properties.value: {autoSize: true,title: { text: 'Weight vs Height (by gender)' },subtitle: { text: 'with name labels' },series: [{type: 'scatter',title: 'Male',data: maleHeightWeight,xKey: 'height',xName: 'Height',yKey: 'weight',yName: 'Weight',sizeKey: 'age',sizeName: 'Age',labelKey: 'name',marker: {shape: 'square',size: 6,maxSize: 30,fill: 'rgba(227,111,106,0.71)',stroke: '#9f4e4a'},label: { enabled: true }},{type: 'scatter',title: 'Female',data: femaleHeightWeight,xKey: 'height',xName: 'Height',yKey: 'weight',yName: 'Weight',sizeKey: 'age',sizeName: 'Age',labelKey: 'name',marker: {size: 6,maxSize: 30,fill: 'rgba(123,145,222,0.71)',stroke: '#56659b'},label: { enabled: true }}],axes: [{type: 'number',position: 'bottom',title: { text: 'Height' },label: {rotation: 45,formatter: function (params) {return params.value + 'cm';}}},{type: 'number',position: 'left',title: { text: 'Weight' },label: {formatter: function (params) {return params.value + 'kg';}}}]}
